snippet: After it was rejected by the national regulator, the combination of 3 Austria and Orange Austria appears headed for approval after the intervention of the E.U. competition commissioner.
abstract: Expected merger of Austrian mobile carriers 3Austria and Orange Austria could set precedent that would make other telecommunications takeovers easier, potentially fulfilling a long-predicted consolidation of the industry in Europe.
lead_paragraph: After it was rejected by the national regulator, the combination of 3 Austria and Orange Austria appears headed for approval after the intervention of the E.U. competition commissioner.

headline.main: Telecoms Merger in Austria Could Open Door to Further Consolidation
headline.print_headline:
Austrian Telecom Merger
Could Change Europe
